Reviews.Title: I love it....everything I thought it would be and more
Reviews.Author: TerryL13
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic.  It takes amazing photos and videos.  Cardinal photo was terrific with the shipment, even in the aftermath of super storm Sandy.  Their communication is spot on.

ProductInfo.Features:
Brand New w/All Supplied Accessories
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ 18-55mm IS II Lens Package 5
